Class SampleTrader

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utility.HelperObject
      • Actor.Actor
        • OrderManagerClient
          • SampleTrader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, TradeScreen

    public class SampleTrader
extends OrderManagerClient
implements TradeScreen, java.lang.Runnable
    - Trader listens to the OrderManager
    - Decides if an order can be directly fill or if it needs to be sliced
    - Returns its choice to the OrderManager
